ai-patthana13.2:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, namely, Tissaka,
ai-patthana13.2:1.1_0: Pleasant feeling arises dependent on the pleasant feeling. Neither pleasant feeling is a cause of phenomena. Personal feeling arises dependent on the mind and pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:1.1_2: There is no such thing as pleasure and pain associated with pleasure and happiness.
ai-patthana13.2:1.1_3: Pleasant feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling. Painful feeling doesn’t give rise to the pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:1.1_4: Thoughts connected with the pleasant feeling. Neutral feeling doesn’t arise dependent on the pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:1.1_5: Thoughts connected with the pleasant feeling, and doesn’t arise because of pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:1.1_6: Thoughts connected with pleasant feeling, and doesn’t arise because of pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:1.1_7: Thoughts connected with the pleasant feeling. It doesn’t associate with pleasant feeling, painful, or neutral feeling conditioned by feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:2.1_2: Painful feeling doesn’t give rise to painful feeling. Neither pleasant feeling is a condition for feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:2.1_3: For unpleasant feeling conditioned by painful feeling, not with the pleasant feeling, and with the intention and no pleasant feeling conditioned by feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:2.1_4: For unpleasant feeling conditioned by painful feeling, neither-pleasant-nor-pleasant feeling, nor by pleasant feeling, and painful feeling arises conditioned by painful feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:2.1_5: For painful feeling conditioned by painful feeling, not with the pleasant feeling as condition: pleasant feeling, or neutral feeling,
ai-patthana13.2:2.1_6: For unpleasant feeling conditioned by painful feeling, not with the pleasant feeling as conditioned by painful feeling, and with the intention and no pleasant feeling conditioned by painful feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:3.1_0: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a neutral feeling. Painful feeling arises dependent on the pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:3.1_1: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling. Putting the teaching is a condition for pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:3.1_2: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a neutral feeling. Painful feeling arises conditioned by feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:3.1_3: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a neutral feeling. Painful feeling doesn’t arise for pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:3.1_4: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a neutral feeling. Painful feeling doesn’t arise for pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:3.1_5: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a neutral feeling. Painful feeling doesn’t arise dependent on the pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:3.1_6: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a pleasant feeling. It doesn’t associated with painful feeling, pleasant feeling, or neutral feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:3.1_7: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.2:4.1_0: ‘In the twenty-first year of a single object the nineteenth year ...
ai-patthana13.2:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.2:6.1_0: Not for the sake of one root, not for the object,
ai-patthana13.2:7.1_0: At the time of the threshold lifetime, and the haunt of closely roaming and transmigrating, both of the same hithern,
ai-patthana13.2:8.1_0: Pleasant feeling is a condition for feeling associated with feeling, not with the pleasant feeling condition.
ai-patthana13.2:8.1_2: Pleasant feeling is a condition for feeling the associated with feeling, not with the pleasant feeling as condition: It is a condition for feeling associated with thoughts, and so on.
ai-patthana13.2:8.1_3: Pleasant feeling is a condition for feeling the associated with feeling, not with the pleasant feeling as condition: both pleasant and painful feeling, etc., with a condition for feeling conditioned by way of feeling, and with the necessary condition.
ai-patthana13.2:8.1_4: Pleasant feeling is a condition for feeling associated with feeling, not for the pleasant feeling born of painful feeling, and with the neutral feeling conditioned by way of body and speech.
ai-patthana13.2:8.1_5: Pleasant feeling is a condition for feeling the associated with feeling, and not the condition for feeling associated with it, and with feeling conditioned by feeling.
ai-patthana13.2:8.1_6: Pleasant feeling is a condition for feeling the associated with feeling, and not with the pleasant feeling as condition: both pleasant and painful feeling, or neutral feeling conditioned by way of body and speech.
ai-patthana13.2:8.1_7: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.2:9.1_0: In the same way the cause of the reason for all alone, without getting rid of the hide of one statement is fit to do the same. This is the exceeding of the speech .
